00369 /* Fixed-point math settings  */
00370 
00371 #define XY_FIXED_SHIFT 16 
00372 #define XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF 8 
00373 #define XY_FIXED_ONE (1 << XY_FIXED_SHIFT) 
00374 #define XY_FIXED_HALF (1 << (XY_FIXED_SHIFT - 1)) 
00376 /* Limits for fixed-point values (for signed 32-bit ints) */
00377 
00378 #define XY_FIXED_MAX 0x7FFFFFFF 
00379 #define XY_FIXED_MIN -(0x80000000) 
00380 #define XY_FIXED_NAN XY_FIXED_MAX 
00394 /* Some standard thicknesses: */
00395 
00396 #define XY_THIN XY_FIXED_ONE

00956 #define XY_mult(a,b) (((a) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) * \
00957                       ((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF))
00958 
00966 #define XY_qdiv(a,b) (((a) / \
00967                        ((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF)) \
00968                       << XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF)
00969 
00979 #define XY_div(a,b) (((b) >> XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) == 0 ? \
00980                      XY_FIXED_NAN : XY_qdiv((a),(b)))
00981 
00987 #define XY_FIXED_DIV_ZERO ((1 << XY_FIXED_SHIFT_HALF) - 1)
00988 
00992 #define XY_fpart(a) ((a) & (XY_FIXED_ONE - 1))
00993 
00997 #define XY_rfpart(a) (XY_FIXED_ONE - XY_fpart(a))
00998 
01002 #define XY_ipart(a) ((a) - XY_fpart(a))
01003 
01007 #define XY_round(a) (XY_ipart((a) + (1 << (XY_FIXED_SHIFT - 1))))
